name: Wounds of Plenty
desc: "Maddening Voice" appears in the Action Order: After any ally target launches a Follow-up ATK, advances their action by 5%. When taking action, action advances the first ally target in the lineup by 100%. After that unit uses an attack, deals 10 instances(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 30% of the ally target's ATK, and up to 4 instances of attacks can take effect. Moreover, all ally targets' "Aftertaste" DMG dealt multiplier increases by 100% of the original multiplier, and a countdown with 150 SPD will appear in the Action Order. Effects will last until the countdown's turn begins.
